edu.flash3388.flashlib.robot.hid

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.flash3388.flashlib.robot.hid.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BooleanDataSource, ButtonListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    POVButton, RioButton, SbcButton, Triggers.Trigger

    public abstract class Button
extends java.lang.Object
implements ButtonListener, BooleanDataSource
    This class represents a button on a joystick/controller. Although it is not mandatory to use this class since there is an FRC one, this class holds many functionalities and when using Actions from flashLib, this class should be used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Button

        public Button(int stick,
              int number)
        Creates a new instance of Button class for a button in a given joystick. A name is generated for the given joystick.
        Parameters:
        stick - An instance of Joystick representing the joystick the button belongs to.
        number - The number of the button on the joystick.

      • Button

        public Button(java.lang.String name,
              int stick,
              int number)
        Creates a new instance of Button class for a button in a given joystick.
        Parameters:
        name - A name to represent the Button.
        stick - An instance of Joystick representing the joystick the button belongs to.
        number - The number of the button on the joystick.

    • Method Detail

      • changedDown

        public boolean changedDown()
        Gets if the button state was changed and is now held down.
        Returns:
        True if the button has changed down.

      • changedUp

        public boolean changedUp()
        Gets if the button state was changed and is now released.
        Returns:
        True if the button has changed up.

      • isHeld

        public boolean isHeld()
        Gets if the button is now held.
        Returns:
        True if the button is held down.

        Returns:

        Returns:
        A String representing the name.
